subject: Team meeting notes - December 10
body:
Hi team,

Attached are the notes from today's meeting. Key action items:
- Sarah: Complete Q4 report by Friday
- Mike: Schedule client call for next week
- All: Review budget proposal before Thursday

Let me know if you have any questions.

Best,
John

subject: Re: Project timeline update
body:
Thanks for the update, Lisa.

The revised timeline looks good. I've blocked off the review sessions on my calendar. Looking forward to seeing the final designs.

Best regards,
David
